Sivakami Sambasivam, an MIT '11, was a previous Associate Director of GPI and La Vaquita Project Action Head. She traveled to La Vaquita in January 2010 as GPI-PSC fellow on an investigatory trip and led the trip to La Vaquita in 2011. Over January 2011, she led the microenterprise project to help 25 women start a small business to commercialize exquisite handicrafts, bags, mirrors, embroidery and generate income to pay high school tuition fees for their children. Over the summer of 2011, she traveled to Mexico as a Laura W. Bush traveling felow and worked with the GPI team to construct 16 greenhouses.
